title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 50.1 - Helmet standards for bicyclists, in-line skaters and operators of scooters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 50.1 - Helmet standards for bicyclists, in-line skaters and operators of scooters

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles adopts the following
sections of title 16 of the Code of Federal Regulations with the same force and
effect as though herein fully set forth at length: part 1203.1, and parts
1203.4 through 1203.17. These standards shall apply to persons required to wear
helmets as set forth in section
1238
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law. These standards shall apply to helmets
purchased on or after January 5, 2000. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
50.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
